name: KEEP YOUR EYES ON THE MONITOR [Jam edition]
name_original: KEEP YOUR EYES ON THE MONITOR [Jam edition]
description:
Welcome to "keep your eyes on the monitor"!

This game is made for "monthly scratch jam #7"

in this game you must to control nuclear reactor, if reactor overloads it will explode good luck! 

inspired by: "Papers please" and "FNaF4"

game is pretty bad but this jam edition.  one day I will post better version of it
